		(Ascending)	(Random)	(Descending)
		Best Cases	Average Cases	Worst Cases
BubbleSort	3.9612e-05	0.00491332	0.00540064

InsertionSort	0.00180649	0.0024482	0.00211873
ShellSort	0.00884486	0.00865754	0.0286826
SelectionSort	0.00160088	0.00164272	0.0339421
MergeSort	0.00510349	0.00528714	0.0503883
QuickSort	0.00196313	0.00157939	0.0559797
